backend/main.mo: Main canister logic managing prompts, blog posts, user profiles, favorites, contact submissions, and authorization with premiumâ€‘access filtering.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state into a new format and seeds initial prompt records during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing feature evidence, related files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document that mounts the React app and loads the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component configuring routes, lazy-loaded pages, theming, and global toasts.
Login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first-time users to enter their name and create a profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders a responsive grid of category cards linking to the library with category filters.
frontend/src/components/categories/categ: Defines category metadata and exports a list plus a lookup helper.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Displays an icon from a sprite sheet based on an index with scaling and positioning.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyButto: A button that copies text to the clipboard and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/FormStatu: Shows loading, success, or error alerts based on form submission state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app layout with header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with navigation links, branding, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the site header with navigation, theme toggle, auth actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/prompts/Favorite: Toggles a prompt as a favorite, requiring login and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptCa: Displays a summary card for a prompt with metadata, copy ability, and favorite toggling.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptDe: Shows full prompt details with category info, premium gating, copy actions, and favorites.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptFi: UI component providing search, category, tier, and sort filters for prompts, with active filter badges and a clear option.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets the document title and meta description based on provided props.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Context provider managing light, dark, and system themes with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Dropdown button allowing users to switch between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Wrapper hook returning the current user's profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for prompts, favorites, user profiles, and blog posts using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom theme variables defining light and dark color schemes with transitions and scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/lib/blogRouting.ts: Utility for generating blog post URLs from titles and parsing IDs from URL segments.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Functions to download single or multiple prompts as text files.
frontend/src/lib/promptFilter.ts: Implements client-side filtering of prompts by search text, category, tier, and sort options.
frontend/src/lib/promptRouting.ts: Builds SEO-friendly prompt URLs and parses prompt IDs from route params.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates email, name, and message fields for forms with basic rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, offerings, and quality details about PromptFarm AI.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Handles login flow, redirects authenticated users, and shows profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading states and links to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single blog post or shows not-found and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of prompt categories with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and status feedback.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with favorites, membership tab, and download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, categories, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Renders a membership selection page showing free and premium plans, highlighting the user's current plan.
frontend/src/pages/NewsletterPage.tsx: Provides a newsletter signup form with email validation, subscription handling, and status messages.
frontend/src/pages/PromptDetailsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed information for a single prompt, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PromptLibraryPage.tsx: Displays all prompts with search, filtering, sorting, and category handling, using debounced search and dynamic filter state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend project.
project_state.json: Describes project state, including seeded prompt requirements and existing features for the prompt library system.
